Name: vastai-install-auth
Who: ML engineers, data scientists, DevOps teams
What: Set up Vast.ai CLI and API authentication with SSH keys and API tokens
When: Starting new ML projects or onboarding team members to GPU cloud
Where: Local workstations and CI/CD environments connecting to Vast.ai platform
Definition_of_Success_Technical: CLI installed and authenticated; API key validated; SSH keys configured for instance access; test instance launch succeeds
Definition_of_Success_Business: Team can provision GPU resources within 5 minutes of onboarding; reduced support tickets for auth issues
Target_Goal: Enable frictionless Vast.ai onboarding with secure credential management
Production: Yes - production API keys and SSH configurations
Author: Jeremy Longshore <jeremy@intentsolutions.io>
